creator: ddurst@la-rubber.com
text:
for 4.0.3 the 8080 port is no longer default port. it is 8180 please correct to 
prevent further issues.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
No, 8080 is still the default port. (at least, this is true of the Tomcat 4.0.3
distribution you can download from Jakarta)

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
I believe RPM's for Tomcat 4 were using altered ports at one point in time so
it co-exist with Tomcat 3.  Perhaps this is where the 8180 came from.  I don't
beleive this is being done anymore.
